roleset.name: cause to not have a center
roleset.note: DECENTRALIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'decentralize' based on sentences in wsj. No access to verbnet at the moment. (from decentralize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: A Soviet legislative panel rejected as not radical enough a government proposal on [*] decentralizing economic control.
